articles.title: Netanyahu and Trump Promote Plan to Expel Palestinians from Gaza
articles.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and U.S. President Donald Trump discussed a plan to relocate thousands of Palestinians from the Gaza Strip, presenting it as a voluntary choice for those wishing to leave.

articles.title: Texas Floods Kill at Least 82 People, with Dozens Still Missing and More Rains Forecast
articles.description: Catastrophic flooding in central Texas has resulted in at least 82 deaths, with dozens still missing. The Guadalupe River's rapid rise led to significant casualties, including children from Camp Mystic.

articles.title: Trump Announces Steep Tariffs on 14 Countries
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced new tariffs on 14 countries, including Japan and South Korea, set to take effect on August 1, escalating global trade tensions.
